forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 2C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 36F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 38F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 35F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
